title: Shadow Line fonts
content:
I am on the hunt for any good shadow-line type faces.  
Here is an example I found in a thread: [http://typophile.com/files/Picture%204\_11.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724034029/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_11.png)

Preferably sans-serif, but any will do. Thanks!
author: thompson
